misc: Bags Miura irons and is rumoured to sleep with them.
biography: Miso, a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, is set to make his tenth appearance in the upcoming edition. Representing Hirsala Golf, Miso is known for his meticulous approach to the game and an unwavering dedication to his equipment.

Having secured one past victory at the Hector Trophée, Miso brings a wealth of experience to the competition. While the coveted Victor Trophy has eluded him thus far, his focus remains steadfast on contributing to a successful team performance. Word has it that Miso's commitment extends beyond the course, with rumours circulating that he is so attached to his Miura irons that he sleeps with them to maintain their peak condition.

Off the course, Miso is known for his calm demeanor and insightful observations on the nuances of the game. His fellow competitors often seek his advice on course management and strategy. Miso's continued presence in the Hector Trophée underscores his passion for the sport and his desire to compete at the highest level.
